snippet.title: Hexepta: Mayor Attack [REMAKE] Case 1: Hacking, Remix!
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

HEXEPTA IS BACK??? FOR REAL??

When I heard that the creator of Hexepta remade Case 1 on AAO, I had to give it a go! What I got as a result has surprised me in all the best ways! It has self-referential moments to some of the more absurd points of the original (I am not pretentious enough to call it a reaction to my reaction ahah) while maintaining the charm, and giving us a sensible and satisfying conclusion! 

I don't know if the creator plans to ever revisit this series or instead focus on other projects- If Ana does, I'd be delighted to see this continuity of Hexepta continue!
-----------------------
This is a remake of Case 1 of Hexepta: Mayor Attack done by the original creator, Ana_, on Ace Attorney Online!
 
You can play it yourself here! http://www.aaonline.fr/player.php?trial_id=112345
----------------------
Hexepta: Mayor Attack is a fangame of Hexepta: Logic Hack and Acquittal: Induction; it is not associated in any way with Ash-Zero Games or Procella Games.

After a young law student named Argus Hakan, by a twist of fate, ends up defending in a trial on his mentor's behalf, he is thrust into a series of cases the following week, all involving various crimes that seem to target the mayor. Argus can solve these cases as they come, but there is clearly something more going on behind the scenes.

You can find the original here! https://forums.court-recrds.net/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=32737
